verses.text: Ix tak'vixi vinhaj Job chi' icha tic:
Vojtac val sik'lab'il to icha chi' yaji. Palta, ¿toc ay junoc onh syal calanoch co b'a vach'il d'a yichanh Dios?
Q'uinaloc sco telaj co b'a yed'oc, malaj am junoc tas syal co pacan d'ay d'a miloc tas sk'anb'ej d'ayonh.
A Dios te nivan sjelanil yed' spoder. Q'uinaloc sco tek'b'ej co b'a d'a yichanh, ¿tocval stechaj cuuj?
A yuj yoval sk'ol Dios tz'ib'xiq'ue lum nivac vitz, tz'el lum k'acap, malaj mach ojtannac tato tzuji juntzanh chi'.
Ayic stzicub'tanhan lum luum tic d'a yed'tal, tz'ib'xi sb'achnub'al luum.
A Dios chi' syal yalan d'a k'u to max javilaj, syalanpax d'a q'uen k'anal to max yak'laj yoc q'ueen.
Malaj junoc mach ix colvaj yed'oc ayic ix yak'anb'at jenhan satchaanh. Anheja' pax stek'anem sat a' mar yic sq'ue chulnaj a'.
A' ix b'oan juntzanh q'uen k'anal scuch nivan Osa, q'uen Oxd'ilanh, q'uen Mootz yed' juntzanhxo q'uen yaman yaji scheclaj d'a stojolal sur.
Manhxo b'ischajb'enoc tastac satub'tac sk'ulej. A juntzanh chi' malaj junoc mach syal snachajel yuuj.
Tato tz'ek' Dios d'a co tz'ey, max yal-laj quilani. Tato tz'ek' d'a chi' ¿toc snachajel vuuj?
Tato ay tas syiq'uek' d'a junoc mach, ¿mach syal scachanoch vaan? ¿mach syal sk'anb'an d'ay tas sk'ulej?
Tato scot yoval sk'ol Dios chi', max yal yoch vaan d'a ichnhej ta'. A eb' ayoch yed' Rahab ol can eb' d'a yalanh yuuj.
Yuj chi', ¿tas lolonel syal valani yic tzin pacan d'a Dios?
Vach'chom malaj in mul, palta max yal-laj in tak'vi d'ay. In juezal yaji, tzin k'anan yoq'uelk'olal d'ayin.
Q'uinaloc svavtej Dios chi' b'aj tzin ch'olb'itaji, vach'chom sk'ochi, palta ¿tocval ol scha yab' tas svala'?
Axo tz'aji, tzam in yak' lajvoc yed' junoc ik'nhab' te ov, svach' nivtaj in yaelal tic d'a ichnhej ta'.
Maxtzac xom yal vik'an vip junoc rato. Tzam te vach' nivtaj in yaelal tic yuuj.
Q'uinaloc svak' pural Dios chi' yic sb'oan icha tzin nib'ej, max yal-laj yujto aton Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil. Q'uinaloc svavtej d'a yichanh eb' juez, ¿mach syal yak'an pural sk'ochi?
Q'uinaloc svala' te vach' in, axo in lolonel sch'oxaneli to ay in paltail. Q'uinaloc svala' to malaj jab'oc in paltail chi', axom Dios tz'alani to manh yeloc.
Vach'chom a in tic malaj in mul, palta malaj velk'och d'a yol in sat, maxtzac yal in k'ol pitzan in.
A in naani, lajanxonhej smasanil. A Dios chi' satanel eb' ay smul yed' eb' malaj smul.
Q'uinaloc sjavi chamel d'a yib'anh masanil anima, malaj tas sna Dios chi' ayic slajviel anima malaj smul.
Scan jun yolyib'anhq'uinal tic d'a yol sk'ab' eb' chuc yuuj, smacchaj sat eb' juez yuuj. Tato manhoc Dios sk'ulani, ¿mach sk'ulan jun?
Elanhchamel tz'ek'b'at in q'uinal, malaj jab'oc tzalajk'olal svila'.
Lajan val sb'ey in q'uinal tic icha sb'ey junoc te' balso d'a sat a a', aton te' b'ob'il yed' te' papiro. Lajan pax icha sb'at xumumoc nok' ch'acb'a yic syaman schib'ej nok'.
Q'uinaloc sb'atcan in yaelal tic satk'olal vuuj, tzalajk'olal am tzin ajcani.
Palta masanil in yaelal tic tonhej tzin somchajel yuuj, yujto vojtac to max in yal Dios vach'il.
Tato ay in mul yalani, nab'anhej svak' vip valani to vach' in.
Vach'chom tzin b'ic in k'ab' yed' nok' xapon, ma yed' yal taanh,
palta a Dios tzin yak'nhejem d'a scal a a' sok'omtac, axo in pichul sq'uixvi vuuj.
Max yal in pacan in b'a d'a Dios icha d'a junoc comon anima. Max yal valani to syal in b'at yed'oc d'a yichanh eb' juez.
Comonoc ay junoc mach syal yak'an vil-laj in b'a yed'oc, syalan tas tzonh aj co chavanhil.
Octom ay junoc mach syal yalan d'ay yic tz'och vaan yak'anoch in yaelal, tz'och vaan in xib'tani.
Tato icha chi', maxtzac am in xiv in loloni, yujto malaj in mul icha eyalan tic.
